Our client is a SaaS company in Chelsea that was founded by a few law school graduates who realized there was a major market gap in the ability of consumers to find and qualify lawyers for anything from day-to-day legal services to more complex needs. They created a platform that enables their users to identify professionals, interact with them, and manage their cases in a seamless and simple approach. They're looking for a Senior Ruby on Rails Developer to join their existing development team.

Piper Companies is currently seeking a Ruby on Rails Engineer for a Direct Hire opportunity with an innovative company in the Raleigh, North Carolina (NC) area. The Full Stack Developer will be a part of the mission critical platform engineering team.
